alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 26 at 9:50PM EDT until April 27 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...In Indiana, Wayne County. In Ohio, Hardin, Mercer, Auglaize, Darke, Shelby and Logan Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
